title: Play: From Idea to Screen
what: Title slide introducing lightning-fast video production using AI tools and parallel workflows. Cover page for the module on transforming ideas into finished videos.

title: Work with a Parallel Video RAG
what: Getting started with Invideo AI v2.0. Steps include: create Google account, use v2.0 model, enter prompt (example: 'How will AI change India's construction sector?'), select format/audience/style, edit script and clips. Security tip: disconnect Google access after use.

title: What Happens in Invideo v2.0?
what: Explains Parallel Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Invideo v2.0 simultaneously retrieves video clips from stock libraries and generates/selects background music. Parallel processing reduces production time from days to minutes.

title: Lights. Camera. Prompt.
what: Example of detailed video prompting with three components: Visual (frontal view, gothic frame, figure emerging, candlelight), Musical (cello, harpsichord, violins, timpani), and Mood (mysterious, haunting, cinematic). Shows how to write effective prompts for AI video generation.

title: Optimize with Clipchamp
what: Microsoft Clipchamp features: Trim & Cut for precise editing, Transitions for smooth scene changes, Text Overlays for titles/captions, and Color Grade for cinematic looks. Cloud-based tool for polishing AI-generated videos.

title: Edit with Descript
what: Descript tutorial: access website, create Google account, upload video/provide URL, edit video by editing text. Revolutionary text-based video editing - edit transcribed text and the video changes automatically. Disconnect Google after use.

title: How Descript Works
what: Four AI technologies powering Descript: Deep Learning (speech-to-text, voice synthesis), NLP (content understanding), Generative AI (avatars, voiceovers), and Computer Vision (scene analysis, effects). Technical breakdown of the AI behind text-based video editing.

title: Explore: Use AI to Learn About AI
what: QR code for AI learning interface. Four steps: scan code, sign in with Google (temporary), read AI-generated summary, ask recommended or custom questions. Meta-learning approach using AI to understand AI concepts.

title: AI Chat Interface
what: AI chat interface features: emoji reactions, message counter, suggested questions, conversation memory, input field with character count, animated send button, history scroll, and clear chat option. UX design elements for intuitive AI interaction.

title: From Idea to Screen: Your Workflow
what: Complete workflow summary: Step 1 - Invideo AI (generate with RAG), Step 2 - Descript (edit like document), Step 3 - Clipchamp (optimize and polish), Step 4 - Explore (learn with AI). End-to-end video production pipeline from concept to finished content.
